mdns::Browser Class Reference

#include <Browser.h>

void pushTxtRecord (lua_State *L, const std::string &txt)

Detailed Description

Browse for devices matching a give service type. Call a lua function when devices are added or removed.

Bindings info:
string_format:'%s' string_args:'(*userdata)->serviceType()' lib_name:'Browser_core'

bool mdns::Browser::getServices ( ) [inline]

Load found services (must be called after waitRead or it blocks).

Reimplemented from mdns::AbstractBrowser.

Definition at line 68 of file Browser.h.

LuaStackSize mdns::Browser::nextService ( lua_State *  L) [inline]

Get next found service. Must call getServices after scheduler waitRead and before nextService.

Returns:
nil if there is nothing left.
